mapper.select: select a.group_seq as group_seq, a.group_profile_img as group_profile_img, a.group_name as group_name, (select count(*) from joining_group where group_seq = a.group_seq) as group_current, a.user_max as user_max, b.group_auth as group_auth from group_info a, joining_group b where a.group_seq = b.group_seq and b.user_id = #{id}
